name: Space Trash Trailer
description:
Just another day on the job collecting trash on another planet, or so you think. What's wrong with your station's bot?
Are you tired of running into invisible walls?
Can you smell space trash through your suit?
Answer these questions NOW in Space Trash Mystery!

This game is a very short teaser-trailer game I made in 14-16 hours. It's my very first game ever, and is meant to end abruptly... just like a good cliffhanger!

IMPORTANT: There are 2 Easter eggs before the end of the trailer that gives you enough hints to explain the end!
